Text:
Dude, this here is just about the nicest download I have ever encountered.  This is a collection of motherfucking educational books, books on tape, he's got books in fucking Finnish, a bunch of songs with lyrics in Finnish.  I mean you could concievably immerse yourself in the Finnish language with all this shit.

One may ask, "12 fucking gigs?"  Yes, because this fine collection may arguably have thousands of dollars worth of educational shit available for illegal free download thanks to this torrent.

Kudos, my friend.
